overview: Music & Musicals, Modern & Alternative Rock, Rock & Pop - Originally packaged with Cooper Temple Clause's 2003 "Kick Up a Fire and Let the Flames Break Loose" album, this brief release shines a spotlight on the band's "Blind Pilots" video, which chronicles a stag party gone wrong -- very, very wrong. Extras include a 15-minute "making of" featurette about the creation of the "Blind Pilots" video, which finds a man turning into the goat god Pan, as well as clips from the video's X-rated version.
title: Cooper Temple Clause: Blind Pilots
